    • Method Detail

      • workerLogin

        private Response workerLogin(LoginRequest request)
        Verify worker login details, including UserID and Password, and his status.
        Parameters:
        request - - the Login request that contains the User ID and Password.
        Returns:
        - WorkerLoginResponse if current worker exist in DB and he not already connected, otherwise return booleanResponse(false).

      • checkCustomer

        private booleanResponse checkCustomer(LoginRequest request)

      • getCustomer

        private Customer getCustomer(int customerID,
                             boolean fast)
        Verify Customer login details, including UserID and Password, and his status.
        Parameters:
        request - - the Login request that contains the User ID and Password.
        Returns:
        - CustomerLoginResponse if current customer exist in DB and he not already connected, otherwise return booleanResponse(false).

      • changeStatus

        private void changeStatus(LoginRequest request)
        Update user login status in the system in Login and Exit.
        Parameters:
        request - - the Log in request that contains the User details.

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
